name: TAF Long
description: TAF Long: Terminal aerodrome forecast (12-30 hours)

validityPeriod.defaultsFunction: () => { const now = new Date(); const d = String(now.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0'); const h = String(now.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); const addHours = (hours) => { const future = new Date(now.getTime() + hours * 60 * 60 * 1000); return String(future.getUTCDate()).padStart(2, '0') + String(future.getUTCHours()).padStart(2, '0'); }; return [{ text: d + h + '/' + addHours(12), description: '12 hours validity' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(18), description: '18 hours validity' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(24), description: '24 hours validity' }, { text: d + h + '/' + addHours(30), description: '30 hours validity' }]; }
